parameters.jsCode:
const rows = $input.first().json.queryResults || [];
const items = rows.map(row => ({
  id: row.id,
  tenantId: row.tenant_id,
  memberId: row.member_id,
  date: row.date,
  heureArrivee: row.heure_arrivee,
  heureDepart: row.heure_depart,
  heuresPause: row.heures_pause,
  heuresTravaillees: row.heures_travaillees,
  note: row.note,
  createdAt: row.created_at,
  updatedAt: row.updated_at,
  memberNom: row.nom,
  memberPrenom: row.prenom
}));

return [{json: {success: true, data: {items: items}}}];
